name: Practice Makes Perfect
summary: Gain a bonus on a failed skill check, which may turn a failure into a success.
description: The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill. This bonus can change the outcome of the targetâ€™s check.
trigger: You or an ally within range fails a skill check for a skill in which you or they are trained.
